String.string: Would You Like to See the Wine List?
I want to treat them to a feast.
We should always be grateful for what we have.
Meet Halwyn, who is scouting the northeast Deathfrost Plains.
Find the wine barrel near the wrecked ship in the Deathfrost Plains.
Collect bottles of wine from the drowned gula officers.
Bring the wine to Halwyn on the Deathfrost Plains.
